movement.name: Swift
movement.description: Movement speed increased by half your Tier (rounded up). Traverse the battlefield quicker.

movement.name: Skirmisher
movement.description: Does not trigger Punish Attacks for moving. +1 space melee attack reach. Maneuver through enemy lines freely.

movement.name: Behemoth
movement.description: Cannot be Grabbed, Moved, knocked Prone, or Stunned. Consistent positioning regardless of enemy interference.

movement.name: Vanguard
movement.description: Double your movement speed on turn 1. Punish Attacks do not consume your reaction and reduce targets movement to 0 on hit. Enhanced zone control and battlefield presence.

movement.name: Mole
movement.description: Move your full speed through soft materials (dirt, clay, loose rock) and half your speed through hard materials (concrete, granite, packed rock). Choose: Create permanent tunnels OR temporary paths. Cannot end turn underground without tunnel creation.

movement.name: Flight (Alternative)
movement.description: Move in any direction, ignore ground obstacles, no terrain penalties.

movement.name: Teleportation (Alternative)
movement.description: Instant movement to visible locations. -2 sp movement penalty when teleporting.

movement.name: Portal (Alternative)
movement.description: Create a pair of linked portals within your movement range, anyone can move and act through them, they persist until the start of your next turn.

attack.name: Focused Attacker
attack.description: Single Special Attack with Tier × 20 points. High-risk, high-reward specialization.

attack.name: Dual-Natured
attack.description: Two distinct Special Attacks, each gets 15 × Tier points. Balanced versatility.

attack.name: Versatile Master
attack.description: 5 Special Attacks, each receives 10 × Tier points. Consistent performance without drawbacks.

attack.name: Shared Charges
attack.description: Build 3 attacks: One consumes 1 charge, one consumes 2 charges, one consumes 3 charges. 10 shared charges among attacks. Action to regain 5 charges. Tier × 10 points per use.

attack.name: Specialist
attack.description: You cannot purchase Attack Upgrades. You instead receive Tier - 2 extra boons. If you attack simply use the base formulas plus the bonus from any Boons you have purchased.

utility.name: Specialized
utility.description: Choose an Attribute, you add your Tier three times to any skill checks made using that Attribute.

utility.name: Practical
utility.description: Choose 2 Attributes, you add your Tier twice to all skill checks using those Attributes.

utility.name: Jack of All Trades
utility.description: You add your Tier once to all skill checks.
